content.en:
1.1. Photo and Video Data
Flicksr is designed to help you organize and clean your photo gallery. We do not upload your photos or videos to any server. All photo processing, analysis, and deletion operations are performed locally on your device.

1.2. Usage Data
We may collect anonymous usage data to help us improve the App. This data does not identify you personally and may include device type, OS version, and general usage statistics.

content.en:
Since we do not collect personal data or upload your media to the cloud, our use of information is strictly limited to:

- Providing the Service: Enabling the App to function on your device.
- Improving the App: Using anonymous crash reports and usage statistics to fix bugs and enhance performance.
